title: Domain Detective
description: We've discovered a suspicious domain: 'https://ctf101.org/'. Use a WHOIS lookup tool to nd out when this domain was registered. The ag is the registration year (4digits).
hints: Search for 'WHOIS lookup' and use websites like who.is or whois.com.
Look for 'Creation Date' or 'Registered On' in the WHOIS results.
The ag format is FLAG{YYYY} where YYYY is the year.
